CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 15, 1947, pg. 31, reads: "'Higher Learning' - Receiving their degrees in their chosen work last Wednesday morning at the commencement exercises of the University of Pittsburgh which were held at the Soldier's and Sailor's Memorial Hall were, left to right: Igal Elam Spraggins, Master of Letters; John M. Brewer, Master of Education; Dr. William Thomas Reed, Doctor of Education; Walter Pedro Newbern, Master of Letters, and Harold L. Scott, Master of Letters. Mr. Spraggins, Mr. Scott and Mr. Brewer are all members of Iota Phi chapter of Omega Psi Phi Fraternity. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: University of Pittsburgh graduates Igal Elam Spraggins, John M. Brewer Sr., Dr. William Thomas Reed, Walter Pedro Newbern, and Harold L. Scott at commencement ceremonies at Soldier's and Sailor's Memorial Hall
